xdi2.core.features.policy.condition

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.policy.condition.Condition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Condition>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EqualsCondition, FalseCondition, GenericCondition, GreaterCondition, IsCondition, LesserCondition, MatchesCondition, TrueCondition

    public abstract class Condition
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Condition>
    An XDI condition, represented as a statement.
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
